intent_atoms.description: Schedule macOS CLI/UI large-file benchmark execution using the R4 protocol once dedicated hardware runners come online.
Execute macOS DocC generation, notarization, TestFlight export, and hardware-dependent QA following the release readiness runbook.
macOS automation with Instruments support is required for large-file benchmark execution.
Evaluate additional handler type categorizations if future boxes require specialized roles beyond the current mapping set.
